title: Cage
synopsis:
When two sisters both start a job at a quiet high school, little did they know they were stepping out of the ordinary and into the perverse. It seems that the school they were assigned to is ran by a cabal of perverted teachers and students, who have every intention of keeping the status quo of orgies, public nudity, and sexual slavery at their school alive—and they're eying the two pretty new teachers who just showed up as recruits, whether they want to join in or not!

(Source: MU)

title: Farfalla
synopsis:
Man's infatuation with womanhood has existed for many centuries. The mythical oracle Tiresias, who is said to have lived as a woman for 7 years, concluded that a woman enjoyed sex 10 times more than man. That story is now retold in a sci-fi setting, where it is possible for one to change their gender in a Ghost in the Shell-esque cyber space.

(Source: Little White Butterflies)

title: Dol-Ota no Boku desu ga Shinken ni Idol Mezashimasu!?

synonyms: Idol Otaku no Boku desu ga Shinken ni Idol Mezashimasu!?
Can an Otaku Like Me Really Be an Idol?
alternative_titles.ja: ドルオタの僕ですが真剣にアイドル目指します!?

synopsis:
Takumi Suzuki, kind of a loner at school and a hardcore pop star fan (and an amateur singer himself) inadvertently uncovers Misaki Hayakawa's secret. Misaki, being the most popular guy at school (as well as Takumi's crush), has to stop this secret from getting out at all costs. As leverage, he makes Takumi dress up as a girl and takes photos of him like this... It's mortifying, but at the same time, it's incredibly exciting... For some reason, Misaki kisses Takumi, and that's when Takumi loses it. He pounces on Misaki, and has his way with him! Takumi apologizes profusely after the deed is done, but Misaki tells Takumi he'd been saving himself for a pop star... The only way Misaki will ever forgive him is if he makes Misaki's dreams come true by becoming a real pop star!!! A geeky, hardcore pop star fan (who's actually a cross-dressing pop star!!) and the most popular guy at school in a heart-thumping pop star romance.

(Source: Renta!)

Included one-shot: Saikyou Bitch Lv.100

title: Kenja no Nagaki Fuzai
synopsis:
Valume Lune Tiltu is a prince who's expected to take the throne, but a simple coronation will not land him the crown. Joined by the mirror spirit Alamine, he must travel across Japan, making contracts with the masters of spirit. As confirmation for each of his agreements, he is presented with one piece of a symbol, and only when this symbol is whole will he become king. But Tiltu not only collects marks from masters to reach his goal of being a ruler, he also makes new friends along the way, friends that are in desperate need of his company. Join the prince, with his newfound chums, inside a world of fantasy that will one day be the domain of Prince Tiltu. 

(Source: ADV)

title: Girls Only

synonyms: She, Her, Her, Hers, Girl's Only

synopsis:
A collection of short stories:

Endless Narcissus by Otosaki Tsubaki
The protagonist wants someone who will love her and her alone, so she gets a clone of herself.

Hidden Meaning by Itou Chika
A writer and an editor are lovers. The writer keeps basing characters on her lover, and the editor wants her to stop because she's afraid that people at work will find out about their relationship.

Maintenance by Itou Chika
A woman fantasizes about the mechanic who works next door to her office building. These fantasies involve being the car the mechanic is fixing.

She, Her, Her, Hers by Otosaki Tsubaki
Sakuya is shaken up by her parents' divorce and is worried that her relationship won't last forever either. Her lover, whose parents are also divorced, understands her feelings and tries to reassure her.

Note: these are only some of the titles contained in this anthology.  In total, there are twelve stories.

(Source: Lililicious)

title: Ginga Nagareboshi Gin Shin Gaiden

synonyms: Ginga - Nagareboshi Gin - Shin Gaiden - Na mo Naki Inu no Uta
Silver Fang Shooting Star Gin Truth Sidestory
alternative_titles.ja: 銀牙流れ星銀　真・外伝

synopsis: After the defeat of Akakabuto, Gin and company travel Japan to console the families of the fallen soldiers.

title: Izure Shinwa no Ragnarok

alternative_titles.en: A Ragnarok to be a Mythology
alternative_titles.ja: いづれ神話の放課後戦争〈ラグナロク〉

synopsis:
Once before Seven mythical Gods appeared on Earth and their battle split the earth, tore the sky. 10 years after the battle, the calamity should have gone already. However, a boy named Shinsen Raika had his true little sister abducted by a god in the battle and was currently standing in the "Academy" on an artificial island in the distant seas.

Here, the night was called as after school time. During that time period, the "Gods' Proxy Wars" were being held by using Divinity-Compatible people for gaining the seat of the law of world (The supreme God).

On the first night, Raika was attacked by a Norse mythological God, Brynhildr. Facing death in front of himself he acquired the detestable power of gods, the power for revenge. Using Absolute Domination power from the devil eye of Balor, he tries to take back the world from Gods control.

A new mythical heroic saga of a devil eye-user person swearing to take revenge on Gods begins now!

synonyms: Survival Strategy Thinking with Game Theory for Save the Weak

title: Gohan Shiyo!
synopsis:
Since her parents were getting a divorce, Natsumi had to leave home and got transferred to a boarding primary school, staying in a dormitory. All of her classmates in the dorm seem to be in all sorts of situations. The dorm is famous for its delicious food. The one who runs the dorm is Natsumi's uncle, Takurou. Though they're kids, BECAUSE they're kids, a lot goes on. But since they're kids, all they need is some food to eat! But still, cohabitation is tough...

(Source: MU)

title: Tenko
synopsis: An orphan boy with a tragic past endeavors to destroy all swords during war time in feudal Japan.

title: OPM × Dangan Tenshi Fanclub

alternative_titles.en: One Punch-Man x Bullet Angel Fan Club
alternative_titles.ja: ワンパンマン × 弾丸天使ファンクラブ

synopsis:
Onepunch-Man/Dangan Tenshi Fanclub crossover ad.

(Source: Mangadex)

title: Inyouchuu Shoku: Ryoushoku Shima Taimaroku

alternative_titles.ja: 淫妖蟲 蝕 ～凌触島退魔録～

synopsis: The demon hunters are back! Mikoto, Sui, and Takeru are sent to investigate a mysterious island where people have been disappearing repeatedly and dark yoma are rumored to be the cause. When the team first arrives it almost feels like a vacation to them, but it doesn't take them long to the feel the presence of something dark and evil...

title: Renai Kyoutei: Nukegake Nashi!

synonyms: Romance Agreement: Don't Steal a March on me!
alternative_titles.ja: 恋愛協定 ~抜け駆けナシ!

synopsis:
A childish student, Shirou carries a torch for his teacher, Oka. Masami, a good friend of Shirou's, who has cherished him like a brother, is confronted by Ryuuji, another friend of them, concerning his true feelings for Shirou. Ryuuji really loves Masami, but pretends to love Shirou, too, in order to attract the attention of the one he loves. Masami and Ryuuji conclude a gentlemen's agreement, in which either of them cannot hit on Shirou. Ryuuji orders Masami to substitute and take care of his sexual desire instead of Shirou.

(Source: MU)

title: Black Market +Plus

synonyms: The Story of Misa-chan's Hard Struggle
alternative_titles.ja: ブラックマーケット ＋プラス

synopsis:
Black Market +Plus has only one extra chapter compared to Black Market

01. Princess in the Window
02. Cafe Violation
03. Compensation
04. Love Slave
05. Showtime
06. Lamentation
07. Neon Genesis Evangelion dj - Bitch
08. Pet Shop
09. The Story of Misa-chan's Hard Struggle
10. Sexual Cupid

Chapter 07 is a parody doujinshi of Neon Genesis Evangelion.

(Source: MU)

title: Radiata Stories: The Song of Ridley

alternative_titles.ja: ラジアータストーリーズ The Song of RIDLEY

synopsis:
In the center of the land lies the human kingdom of Radiata and surrounding it are the lands of fairies, elves and goblins. The relationships between the two species were never good but things got worse after the attack of the dragons.

Today is the Knighthood entrance exam for Ridley Silverlake and she has been training for this moment her entire life. Winning the tournament today means she will be initiated into the knighthood. Her first round is against a boy her age named Jack Russell and she defeats him with ease. She fights her way to the finals where she becomes the champion and a knight only to find out that Jack, who is the son of the legendary dragon slayer, was also inducted.

(Source: MU)

title: Kisei shite Level-ageta n da ga, Sodachisugita kamo Shirenai

synonyms: I Leveled up from Being a Parasite, But I May Have Grown Too Much
alternative_titles.ja: 寄生してレベル上げたんだが、育ちすぎたかもしれない

synopsis:
Caught up in a ritual performed by a God in another world, Eiji Choukai is transported to another world. The otherworldy God responsible for the ritual looked at Eiji potential incarnations, they pulled out Classes like those from “I reincarnated into a vending machine”, but whereas there are normally several tens of Classes available for a person, the only Class avaiable for Eiji was “Parasite”.

Having no choice but that one set-in-stone Class, Eiji reincarnates into his new world despondent. However, after using his powers he suddenly realized its potential. Using the parasite’s powers, he finds he can amplify himself countless times by obtaining other people’s powers. it could be that Eiji’s level might rise too much.

(Source: 	BionicArk Translations)

title: Rolling
synopsis:
Do the math--in a high school male dormitory room, there are four bunk beds…but five boys! Will these five hot dudes--Mi-Oh, Chi-Young, Jay, Ji-Myung, and Il-Yong--be able to make the best of the tight situation? Follow them as friendships--and possibly more--begins to develop among them!
(TOKYOPOP)

title: Dear Nemesis
synopsis:
Calmia Phlox is given a second chance at life, but this time, she must compete against her beloved twin brother to gain back her coveted status and title as Countess Phlox. What's more, her nemesis wants to... marry her?! Striking a deal with her former archenemy, Rudbeckia, while struggling between her ambitions and her fondness for her brother, will Calmia reclaim what is hers?

(Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Jigokuraku Tokubetsu-hen: Mokke no Mori

alternative_titles.en: Hell's Paradise: Jigokuraku Side Story - Forest of Misfortune
alternative_titles.ja: 地獄楽 特別編 勿怪の森

synopsis:
Enjoy this special side story to celebrate the launch of the Hell's Paradise anime series! The children of a small village try to take down the stranger who's started living nearby, but he won't die no matter what they do to him!

(Source: MANGA Plus)

title: Mimiyori Harmonia
synopsis:
"Headphone." Japan world class audio item.

Nene had came across headphones by a chance. From here on she starts her road to become a headphone maniac.

title: Soushokukei Ism
synopsis:
Late, lost, and stranded in a forest, transfer student Maeda Mitsu's day can't get any worse, that is, until she meets a forest boy who was playing with bear cubs. Turning around, she found herself face to face with the mother of the bear cubs... and then...!?

(Source: AQUA Scans)

title: Totsukitooka

synonyms: Kago no Naka no Kotori wa Itsudeyaru Zero
When Will the Caged Bird Be Released

synopsis:
1-4. Kago no Naka no Kotori wa Itsudeyaru (When Will the Caged Bird Be Released)
5-6. Kago no Naka no Kotori wa Itsudeyaru Zero
7-9. Owari no Nikkichou (Diary of the End)
10. Tsuitenai Shoujo
11. Kanae-chan Smile!

title: Doushitemo Yaritakute Gakuen

alternative_titles.ja: どうしてもヤリたくて学園

synopsis:
Four idiot high school students attending a boy's school for idiots are on a quest to get girlfriends! For this, they need to better understand the female mind! They somehow make the logical leap that the best way to do so is through doing gay stuff with each other. With BL manga in hand, they start their pleasure investigation!

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

title: Ame no Mukou, Kimi to
synopsis:
Fumiya is always laughing, even when he's sad. That's how he's chosen to present himself and he continues doing so even when he's left the country, but a man named Lionel has the ability to see beyond his emotional facade and bridge the infinitely fractured distance between them.

A lyrically written love story that chronicles the times happily spent together by a couple.

(Source: Indigo Scanlations, Cosmique Scans)

title: Omae no Gohoushi wa Sono Teido ka?

alternative_titles.ja: お前のご奉仕はその程度か?

synopsis:
After a lifetime of hardship due to a curse placed on him by his grandfather, all Ryouta wants is to be left alone. However, when he wanders into the mountains to find some peace and quiet, instead he finds a town taken over by vampires! To make matters worse, one of its residents, a haughty (and rather eccentric) girl, soon sets her sights on him with the goal of making him her servant. Now, Ryouta has a choice to make-escape back to his old life in Japan or live out his days as the minion of Shiren Fuyukura in the quirky town of Akinomiya.

(Source: Yen Press)

title: Guang zhi Zi
synopsis:
Zhang Gong decides to learn light magic, a magic few show interest in and eventually becomes the legendary Grand Mage. While trying to end the continent's east and west separation in order to unite all of the different races, he becomes every race's Child of Light.

(Source: MU)

title: Tottemo Hot na Chuushinbu♥

synonyms: The Leave It to Us Twins
alternative_titles.ja: とってもホットな中心部♥

synopsis:
1. Narumi-chan no Kare Jiman (Narumi's Bragging About Her Boyfriend)
2. Yuuwaku Beach (Temptation Beach)
3. Yuuwaku Visitor (Temptation Visit)
4-5. Daitai Kanojo (Substitute Girlfriend)
6. Shiken Kikan no Hinichijou (The Extraorfinary Testing Period)
7. Shiken Kikan no Enchousen (The Extra Testing Period)
8. Kamisama Play (God Play)
9. Omakase Twins (The Leave It to Us Twins)

title: Tantei Aoneko
synopsis:
It was the roaring 20's, and the country was Japan. Bluecat, or Aoneko, is a debonaire aristocrat with too much money and leisure time. Along with his servant boy Tigerman, he dabbles in private detective work much to the chagrin of the real police detective Mr. Bee-Prince (Hachiouji). Bluecat is handsome—and yes, he knows it—witty, polite, and popular among the rich. However, his deviant libido, as well as his own attractive nature, often land him in danger.

(Source: MU)

title: Heibon na Ore ♂ dakedo Isekai de Dekiai saretemasu: Anthology Comic

alternative_titles.en: I'm Mediocre ♂, but I'm Loved in a Different World
alternative_titles.ja: 平凡な俺♂だけど異世界で溺愛されてます　アンソロジーコミック

synopsis: Heibon na Ore ♂ dakedo Isekai de Dekiai saretemasu is a collection of boys-love one-shots centered around men reincarnating into different worlds.

title: Tabi to Michizure
synopsis:
Tabi is traveling to a town to meet her Childhood friend, "Kou-chan", on a train. When she arrives, she meets an Officer, Nishimura, and an energetic young man. Yukita; both are which surprised that she came on a train that has never come before. Shortly after arriving, she discovers this town isn't ordinary in the least, and has a puzzling problem. Certain roads in the town will try to "eat" people by randomly falling into a deep pit, the town resets after each day, making the same events as the previous day occur, and the townspeople don't notice anything out of the ordinary, forgetting each time; the exceptions being Tabi, Yukita, and Nishimura. 

(Source: MU)

title: Doukyo Suru Neneki
synopsis:
1-9. Slime living together
10. Hedonic nerve
11. Missing boy 2

title: Garden
synopsis:
1. Concrete Garden
2. Clock Down
3. Dogla+Magla
4. Memento Mori

title: Worst Gaiden
synopsis: Series of One-shots related to the Worst/Crows Universe.  It is essentially two stories the first being about the Umehoshi brothers and their time at Suzuran and the second story is about how The Front of Armament is formed.

title: Citrus Encount

alternative_titles.ja: 四姉妹（しとらす）エンカウント

synopsis:
College student Kono Mirai returns to his hometown after an absence of ten years. On the day of homecoming, he encounters 4 sisters who were his childhood friends. Mirai's daily routine has fallen apart, what will happen to Mirai's peaceful daily life?

(Source: FairGame)

title: Nekomichi
synopsis: Short stories about cats.

title: Kitsune to Pancake
synopsis:
About three years ago, animal children called "Kemonoko" suddenly began appearing throughout Japan. These children are equally  intelligent to humans—the only difference being that they share characteristics similar to the animals they represent. To ensure that they can grow up normally, each Kemonoko is paired with a parent, usually a single male, to serve as a father figure.

Konno, a fox girl, is living happily with her father. As she attends a Kemonoko-specialized school with her friends, her presence alone guarantees a day full of cuteness!

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Girls Must Die!

alternative_titles.ja: ガールズ・マスト・ダイ！

synopsis:
Baba Bunta, young prison guard, is assigned to work at women's penitentiary. Every inmate in his section is sentenced to death for committing major crimes. In order to prevent mental illness and suicides, women have greater freedom than usual, although every single one of them is deadly and dangerous criminal.

Will Bunta, who already had problems with women in the past, resist beautiful, tempting women's bodies?

(Source: MU)

title: Himitsu no Yuri Esthe

synonyms: Himitsu no Yuri Esthe Friend Course

synopsis:
Kurumi Kamiya is a first-year college student with multiple male friends. Unfortunately, they think of her as nothing more than a friend. She has a childish face, almost no feminine appeal, and is lacking in the height department. If she does not want to be single forever, a change must come soon. When the beautiful and seductive Moeka Kayama recommends that Kurumi visit a salon to improve her looks, she cannot resist. 

Upon arriving and undressing for a massage, Kurumi meets Tsukino, the esthetician and manager of the salon whose passion is to help young women become more attractive. However, Kurumi soon learns that Tsukino's methods for achieving this are far more unorthodox than she had originally expected... 

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Dennou Kakugi MephistoWaltz

alternative_titles.ja: 電脳格技メフィストワルツ

synopsis:
Prodigal pianist Morimiya Francois permanently injures his left hand and his musical career is brought to an abrupt halt. He plunges into despair with no other interests or skills to live for, but amidst the darkness, he stumbles across his video game doppelganger and is quite forcefully introduced to the world of fighting games. Where will this new hobby lead him?

(Source: MU)

title: Log Horizon Gaiden: Honey Moon Logs

alternative_titles.ja: ログ・ホライズン外伝 HoneyMoonLogs

synopsis: The events of Log Horizon narrated from the point of view of the Crescent Moon Alliance, especially Henrietta and Marielle.

title: Okaa-san (10-sai) to Boku
synopsis: Haru-kun is a transfer student who moved into a new town with his mother. One day his mother suddenly turned into the same age as him.

title: Seku☆Tsuga

synonyms: Sex ga Yosugite Tsugai ni Nacchaimashita

synopsis:
Hikari (Ω) works in the night business and only cares about money. One day, salaryman Dan Seiroudou (α) asks Hikari to give a farewell gift to his boss, who was Hikari's regular client and is now transferring to a different unit. Since his best client and money source is leaving, Hikari wanted to catch Seiroudou, but they unexpectedly cause each other's heat and end up becoming mates during intercourse. It's not much of a deal for Hikari... but the serious Seiroudou wants to get married!

(Source: MU)

title: Hate no Kouya de Vacances wo

alternative_titles.ja: 果ての荒野でバカンスを

synopsis:
1. Futaribocchi no Ever After
2. Kaeru no Ouji-sama
3. Hate no Kouya de Vacances wo
4. End Roll

title: Spotlight
synopsis:
Kyouhei Saito, a first-year college student who's gloomy and negative—in other words, "depressing"—falls in love with Ayame Ogawa, a beauty and contestant of their school's beauty pageant. Will the depressing nobody's feelings reach the goddess who basks in the spotlight? The curtain rises on an ensemble cast drama of college students shaken by the glimmer and helplessness of youth!

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

title: Gundam: G no Reconguista

alternative_titles.ja: ガンダム Gのレコンギスタ

synopsis:
The Universal Century, with its history of colonization and wars, passes into posterity, and time flows on.

Mankind enters a new age of seemingly endless peace and prosperity called the "Regild Century."

The year is R.C. 1014. The Capital Tower, an orbital elevator, connects earth and space. Due to its role in supplying Earth's power by transferring Photon Batteries from space, it is worshiped with a religious fervor. Bellri Zenam, a cadet in the Capital Guard formed to protect Capital Tower, is participating in his first non-simulated exercise when he is attacked by the powerful but unaffiliated "G-Self" mobile suit. He manages to capture the G-Self while piloting a "Recten" maintenance mobile suit. However, seeing the G-Self's pilot, a young space pirate named Aida Rayhunton, stirs something within him, as does the G-Self which he was sure he'd never seen before. Why does the G-Self accept Bellri as a pilot?

Aida's mission to attack Capital Tower. Bellri's destiny as a chosen pilot of the G-Self. The truth which will shake the Regild Century.

It was all the beginning of the Reconguista.

(Source: Gundam.info)

title: Raijin to Ryman
synopsis: Depressed about a love for a straight coworker that would never be fulfilled, a salary man wanes through his greyed daily life. One day, he comes home only to be confronted by a man sitting on a floating cloud demanding to make him human. And thus started the daily life of a thunder god and a salary man.

title: 100-man Pound no Ai

synonyms: Otoko no Ko Onna no Ko

synopsis:
1. 100-man Pound no Ai
2. Funeral March
3. Otoko no Ko Onna no Ko
4. Shimizu Reiko no Konjaku Monogatari
5. Kiss Me Vanpanella
6. Foxy Fox
7. Sansaro Monogatari

title: Momichupa Oppub♂Time

alternative_titles.ja: もみチュパ雄っぱぶ♂タイム

synopsis:
Naoto Shimada is a yes man, a person who never says no to anything, who just got fired since he was asked to take the blame. On the other hand, His friend from college, Takeru Yamashita, is successful and well-liked among his peers. Takeru knows a friend who runs a sex shop who is looking for a well-built man, so he recommends Naoto, who needs the money.

(Source: Mangago)

title: Shugoreisama ni Tsuitekoi

synonyms: Protection Spirit Being in the Way of Love
Protection Spirit in the Way of Love

synopsis:
Everybody has a protection spirit. Their behavior has a direct influence on the person they protect. For instance, if protection spirit A falls in love with protection spirit B, then host of A will fall for host of B (synchronized effect).

Karin has Hiriji as a protection spirit and that's why he doesn't have friends. It all changes when Karin has a little incident and gets help from his sensei (teacher), Takatsugu, who's protection spirit is Nagi. Sensei is the school nurse and can see, hear, and touch protection spirits and (the same as Nagi) was a playboy 'till he meet Karin (Hiriji).

(from B-U)

title: Turning Point
synopsis:
In the pursuit of his dream to become a successful writer, Sakuragi Keigo has become jaded and disillusioned. All he really wants any more is a good night's sleep, unburdened by the stress and pressure of his career. When he picks up a stranded Imamura Toshiki, a student looking for his own dream to follow, Sakuragi finds himself being inexplicably kind to the younger man. Why? Will Imamura be able to help Sakuragi sleep through the night?

(from Biblo Eros)

title: 7 Senchi!
synopsis:
One day, while in search for more food, our heroine stumbles upon a jar of what looked like umeboshi; little did she know that it would bring her more than just a full stomach. The mysterious snack somehow makes her shrink and she can only grow back when she eats something (which is a bit of a chore if you're THAT tiny). And if that's not troublesome enough, she's also dealing with her crush who seems to like her best friend!?

(Source: Shoujo Crusade)

title: Mottomo Utsukushii Uso no Koto
synopsis:
One evening, Kurosu Keiichiro, a student at an Art University, runs after a young man who forgot his umbrella on the train, and misses the last train home. The young man turns out to be Yukari Yohito, a fellow student at his school and is famous for his artwork. Yukari invites him to stay the night at his place, and Kurosu obliges. Following that, Kurosu finds himself visiting Yukari's home often, and begins to take care of him, as Yukari is hopeless while he is not painting. However, slowly but surely, Kurosu begins to develop deeper feelings for Yukari...

(Source: MU)

alternative_titles.ja: きゅーてぃーびーすと

title: Bijo to Kenja to Majin no Ken

alternative_titles.en: Beauty, Sage and the Devil's Sword
alternative_titles.ja: 美女と賢者と魔人の剣

synopsis:
After falling into the gap between worlds, I gained “the ability to identify something’s status” for the cost of a single limitation. However, other than this skill I was completely ordinary. All I could do after landing in a strange world, was see through the status of things and use that information for my own growth. One day, after being assaulted by enemies, a lone figure appeared and saved my life. What’s more, that person had an incredible “secret”.

(Source: MU)

title: Ao no Hana Utsuwa no Mori

synonyms: The Blue Flower and The Container Forest

synopsis:
Aoko is a ceramic painter at Hasami Wares Pottery, when suddenly an unfriendly and unapproachable man named Tatsuki arrives from overseas. Rejecting her way of life by telling her he isn't interested in painted ceramics, Aoko feels dejected, but can't help but be drawn to Tatsuki's ceramics...

This is a mature love story of a man and woman, both fascinated by ceramics.

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)

title: Kikaider 02

synonyms: Artificial Humanoid Kikaider. Jinzo Ningen Kikaider

synopsis:
On the surface, Jiro appears to be a normal teenage boy — he's riddled with self-doubt, has trouble making friends, and owns a guitar he doesn't know how to play. But he's really Kikaider, a super-powered android with a secret "Gemini" device implanted in his brain to help simulate human qualities. Professor Gill, a former associate of Kikaider's creator, is hunting for the Gemini device… and he'll go to any lengths to recover it!

(Source: CMX)

title: Anthology Minna de Sarazanmai

alternative_titles.ja: アンソロジー みんなでさらざんまい

synopsis: An anthology comic of Sarazanmai by various mangaka.

title: Geshuku Biyori
synopsis:
"Kindly move out within 6 months." Masachika Fujimaki, the new apartment manager, makes this sudden declaration to the tenants of Wisteria Manor. Having lived there for so long without incident, “shock” doesn't begin to describe how the tenants feel. To top it all off, the cool and always aloof Masachika turns out to be (of all things) gay. Though he’d always thought himself to be straight, tenant Kei Kuraya finds himself attracted to Masachika. Discover the heart-warming story of men from all walks of life living happily together.

(Source: MU)

title: Fukigen na Ouji-sama
synopsis:
Clarissa is on a mission. The Kingdom of Marik needs a prince, and it's Clarissa's job to see that Jack Brown takes on his rightful position--even if he doesn't want to. Is it just Marik and the king that need Jack, or will Clarissa get her prince, too?

(Source: Amazon)

title: Hatsukoi - Host

The name of the boy is "Tsubame"!

The two meet by chance, but Chiruda senses something strange about Tsubame, who loves freedom and reading books... what is the big secret he holds!? A new-age fantasy of their adventures set in a breathtaking world!! "

Mitsuru Masamune, a mild mannered high-schooler who hasn't had much of a presence since his birth one day had a roommate move in. A silver-haired, blue eyed exchange student all the way from Germany, Leo. They had a dignified appearance and had a cool way with their words with no room for timidity. He used to think that Leo was a being far off from someone like him till he got to know about a secret of his after which their relation got a bit more special...?!

In Girly Air Force, mysterious flying creatures known as Zai suddenly appear, and in order to fight the creatures, mankind creates fighter aircraft called "Daughters," as well as the automatic fighting mechanism "Anima," which are shaped like human girls. The story centers on a young man named Kei Narutani, who yearns to fly in the sky, and an Anima considered to be humanity's trump card, a girl named Gripen.

synopsis:
Monica Everett, the Silent Witch. She is the sole magician in the world who can use non-verbal magic. She is also the young hero who defeated the legendary dragon all on her own. However, the truth is...she is just super shy! She learned non-verbal magic just to avoid talking with others.

Unaware of the talent she possesses, she is chosen as one of the "Seven Sages," tasked with the top-secret mission of escorting the second prince...? She is weak and timid but also the strongest. This is the thrilling fantasy of a hikikomori witch who hides her true abilities, secretly casting justice on the evil that approaches the prince.

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

A high school girl named Shin Dong San comes back from America to Korea, and she is short, fat, and ugly. She gets picked on by her fellow classmates, gets rejected from her love, and is even picked on by her childhood friend, Jeh Suh. Tired of her intolerable life, she attempts to hang herself, but fails because the rope could not handle her weight. After the fall, she discovers a box filled with medicine, and one particular bottle says that if she takes it she can become and look however she likes...

(Source: Sarang Syrup)

synopsis: A collection of yuri stories by Jin Takemiya.

synopsis:
Tachibana Kazuya, Kumazawa Daigo, and Niinuma Hiroko all want to be popular. But they don't know how to do so! So, they try and create a club to research and find out how to become popular.

title: Kanyuu Shoujo
synopsis:
Because of upcoming exams, Hina Shirakawa and her boyfriend Tomo are the only two members left in their high school swimming club. Their job now is to bring in new members or the club will be terminated. With the best of intentions and in hopes of attracting as many people as possible, Hina distributes a recruitment poster displaying a rather revealing picture of herself.

Hina soon finds herself alone with several people who have gathered in the clubroom after seeing the poster. Things start to take a strange turn when the newcomers begin touching her in inappropriate places.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

Sakuya and Wakyo are reincarnated and reunited only to discover that Bishu-sama — their master and mentor from a past existence—is in their midst and in grave danger from vengeful demons! Still unsure of their own powers and the nature of their cunning and elusive enemy, they must race against time to rescue Bishu from the dark forces that roil within his reincarnated form.

synopsis:
Aix is a 19-year-old E-rank adventurer. He is a "prodigy" mage that solely specializes in "Effect Duration Extension." He has spent the last five years working like a slave around the clock throughout the week. When he finally collapses from exhaustion and wakes up on his doorstep, he finally comes to terms with himself. "I'm going to quit this job!"

After quitting his job as an adventurer, Aix announces that he will no longer work. The people who had been enjoying the benefits of his work panic when they realize that there is no one to replace him, but it is too late. He smiles and refuses all the threats and attempts to coerce him. "I will NEVER work again!" The new life of a novice mage says he won't work begins now!

(Source: Shousetsuka ni Narou, translated)

title: Again My Life
synopsis:
A righteous prosecutor, life reset, punish the villain!

A hot-blooded prosecutor, Kim Hee-wu was murdered, cast into the ocean while chasing the tyrant who controlled Korea. But, Kim Hee-wu meets a grim reaper who gives him a second chance and sends him back to when he was 18 years old. As a high schooler, Kim Hee-wu prepares to punish the tyrant Jo Tae-seop.

"To catch the devil, you must become one."

(Source: Kakao, translated)

title: Phantom: Phantom of Inferno

alternative_titles.ja: ファントム Phantom of Inferno

synopsis:
Mafia is rife in America where assassinations are a regular occurrence on the streets. Inferno, a mysterious company, is behind most of these dealings through the use of their near-invincible human weapon, "Phantom."

One day, a Japanese tourist accidentally witnesses Phantom's latest murder. Desperate to escape, the tourist hides in a secluded building. However, Phantom, revealed to be a young woman named Ein, and the leader of Inferno "Scythe Master" captures the tourist and brainwashes him.

Given the name "Zwei," this once peaceful tourist is now a puppet of Inferno with no memories. Drawn into a world of lies, deceit, and violence, Zwei must fight to survive, hopefully to one day regain his memories and escape from this world where he is constantly on the brink of death.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Duelant
synopsis:
The story takes place in medieval Europe, where warriors from across the whole continent are embroiled in vicious duels to prove their might, with the victor being ordained by God. Katrea is being viciously targeted by the victor of one of these duels in her hometown, whereupon a chance encounter brings her into contact with a small, black-haired Asian man who offers to fight to free her from her subjugation.

(Source: Otaquest, edited)

title: Himesama Ninpouchou: Tenka☆Musou

alternative_titles.ja: 姫様忍法帳 天下☆無双

synopsis:
Young orphan princess Hanzou Hattori has led a peaceful life in the village that has sheltered her since she was a girl... but a stronger force is calling her! With her faithful bird-friend Jubeh (and a few bumbling “helpers”), Hanzou must transform from a shy girl into a powerful ninja warrior who holds a secret key deep within her to peace and happiness in the land. Will Hanzou keep her promise and use the power to protect the ones she loves most?

(Source: DMP)

Satou Atsushi isn't neglected by his family so much as ignored completely. Left to fend for himself, Atsushi fails to learn human speech and instead learns "cat language" and "Dog language" from the family pets. When he's eventually socialized with other children, his speech is stunted and his social graces leave something to be desired. But on his first day of nursery school, he meets a gloomy blonde with the same last name who seems to be a safe enough choice in a first friend. After developing a rather sizeable fixation with Satou Manato, he finds out that there his first friend is seriously ill and has a twin; Shuuto.

Years later, two other friends begin school and find that there are two Satous in their class too. Two Satous who, at first glance, could easily be mistaken for twins, but there's a bit more to things than it first appears...

(Source: MU)

title: Boku no Adelia
synopsis:
I was picked up by a beautiful but shy and useless vampire? Joel, an orphaned boy wandering the forest alone, collapsed and was picked up by the vampire Adelia.  Adelia is a beauty, but she is shy with others and her daily life is completely dysfunctional.  So who is taking care of whom?  

The clumsy communal life of these two awkward lonely people begins.

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

title: Dakara Ore ni Shina yo
synopsis:

Little does she know about the rivalry between the gangs of North High and its opponent South High (the high school which her childhood friend, Kanata, attends). During her first week there, she is captured by gang leader Shuugo and finds out about the "Princess Game," in which she will play a key role.

(Source: Nagareboshi)

title: Shitto wa Ai wo Kumoraseru
synopsis:
Kirino feels that his talent for piano is at its limit. On the other hand, his junior, Takase, who is naïve and loved by everyone, is blossoming with talent. Kirino feels annoyed by Takase's admiration for him and views him as a thorn in his side. However, Takase doesn't even hesitate when he tells Kirino, "Senpai is my everything..."

Kirino doesn't trust Takase, and uses his longing for him to play with his feelings, wanting to make him feel troubled. "You're too shy to even look at me when I'm by your side, it's so cute how you look like a puppy when you're trembling with expectation."

Feeling complacent because of Takase's affection, Kirino gradually starts to depend on him...!?

(Source: Shu-Cream, translated)

Game studio employee Jeong-u Park is selected by the Earth as someone who can save the planet, but he must first survive in a world where people are now killing each other for power. He also must compete with other saviors to retain his planet-saving abilities. As doomsday approaches, can Jeong-u become the savior the world needs?

The hero is Yubi Chizuo again. He's a student like before, but this time round he's a dropout. He stays in his house, which is a family shop selling watches and clocks. He gazes and gazes at the clocks. Little by little, he turns into a clock.

title: I Will Fall With the Emperor
synopsis:
"You, too, will be corrupted. Then I will make it all come true."

If I had only joined hands with him and agreed to become his mistress then, could I have lived a little longer? At least I would not have know the pain of my eyes being gouged out. But instead I shouted: "I refuse. I will not betray my country," not realizing that my country, my family, had betrayed me long ago. Sacrificed, used, abandoned, and finally executed by my own family... I only realized after returning to 10 years in the past that the reason why you wanted me to stand by your side is because you and I were so much alike. Let us fall together this time.

(Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)

synopsis:
After a man-made pathogen known as the K virus is accidentally released from Fieldwar Labs in the heart of Tokyo, the city is overrun by flesh-eating zombies. In the hopes of saving the last-remaining survivors of this apocalypse, an organization known as Madara sends out its rookie member in a last-ditch effort to find a cure. Young Itachi must survive the zombie-ravaged streets of Tokyo while searching for the missing key that's integral to Japan's survival!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

synopsis:
"The story of a man who runs at the forefront of the voice acting industry."

Manga adaptation of the first book written by the voice actor renowned for his roles as numerous protagonists in various series, Kaji Yuki. The book tells the story of the troubles Kaji shared back in his early days, and how they now form his passion towards this occupation of "voice acting." A toast to all who are working towards their dreams! What does it mean to hold a dream? And what do we do to make it a reality?

(Source: Kajipedia)

title: Ana Aki Bukuro wa Wasuregachi

synonyms: A Pocket Full of Holes Forgets Everything

synopsis:
Tomio is a man who forgets everything. From failing to bring his cell phone to an important meeting to flat out forgetting what he is supposed to do at his job, his forgetfulness causes him a lot of trouble. The only person who sticks with him through it all is his loving girlfriend Asuka, whom he intended to propose to until he forgot the ring as well. Driven to despair, Tomio feels compelled to commit suicide—but a precious reminder saves him from his woes.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Otome-Kikan Gretel

alternative_titles.ja: オトメキカングレーテル

But Nagi volunteers to escort her - in fact, she's positive frantic to do so, and immediately starts to court Yuu, who is thrown off her stride when she's so openly being pursued by a beautiful girl.

synopsis:
Contains one main story and two one-shots.

The heroine is a girl who has no clue about romance.

Her point of view: 
My childhood friend is a cute guy, and he always come to my house in the morning to wake me up. Although he can be quite mean sometimes, being with him makes me feel very happy. But, once the fact that we're not dating became known, many girls began to hit on him, and start to confess. But, it seems that I feel something towards him lately! What ever should I do now?

Nanako Kobayashi, a 17-year-old teenager, has an ugly face who seems to not have a care for the world. One day, she got a call, only to be given two choices to answer a question. A devil suddenly appears, taking the form of her teddy bear. The devil is willing to grant her three wishes, each based on two options. What wishes will Nanako choose?

The series centers on Makoto Shiranui, a boy who travels to Tokyo seeking to become the apprentice of Mamoru Hoshisato, a world-famous magician and friend of his parents. Ever since he had watched a show by Mamoru and his wife Maive, he had dreamed of being a magician. Their daughter Kana (nicknamed Hatena) has been Makoto's friend since childhood. Even though Tokyo has had a rash of burglaries by a beautiful woman thief, Makoto can rest easy as long as Hatena is there. When he arrives at the Hoshisato residence, a haunted mansion, the family butler Jeeves and the maid Emma greet him, and he is reunited with Hatena, only to find out that they don't really get along now.

Their relationship began with contractual sex but before they know it, the two of them are attracted to each other. However, the thief's younger brother kidnaps the guard to get revenge on his elder brother and a big group gang rapes him-!! Adeline Rotyn gave everything to her husband, Duke Venzak. That is, until he kills her one dark and stormy night. Instead of dying, she finds herself transported years into the past. Determined to make the most of her second chance at life, she vows to become stronger and escape her horrid fate.

After being gone for 300 million years, the Pokémon Genesect reappears in the world! When a group of Genesect try to take over the home of other Pokémon, Mewtwo engages them in a fierce battle! Will super speed be enough to win this fight?

synopsis:
New teacher Yuu Okada and his senior, Ms. Rumi are on a field trip with their 16 elementary students to Sanrio Puroland. But suddenly they wander into a mysterious and horrific theme park called "Yuropia!" Amid their confusion, ominous Frog Egg mascots announce that the only way for them to escape is to "conquer the attractions and gather 10 medals." Will they be able to get out of Yuropia in one piece?! This is a story for those of you who "carry pain in your heart."

Tomoya rejected the confession from his classmate, Kazuki, stating height as the main reason. Two years later, Kazuki became taller and came back once more. Contains original stories set in the Star Wars universe featuring characters from the six films. This work shows you many different sides of the familiar franchise, featuring everything from comedy to tragedy to despair to redemption. (Source: Waterstones)

Star Wars Silver contains the following stories;

Since his girlfriend was beaten to death by a biker gang, Yamato Souhei has driven himself to become stronger and better at fighting. He's newly out of juvenile detention, and his friend Kijima helps him get back into life with a new job. His strength will be useful for the bouncer organization "Back Drop," which will make use of his abilities to provide security for clubs and other places.

Before he even signs on with the company, though, he happens across a group of people beating a man to death. Yamato can't save the man, but he does see the face of one of the attackers. Along with his new job as a bouncer, it looks like Yamato has become involved in a dangerous cycle of violence.
